backend/main.mo: Defines core trading, account, deposit, bonus, fee, and profile types plus maps and authorization logic, providing getters/setters like M-Pesa number and profile operations.
feature_evidence.json: Describes two rebuild/redeploy and smoke‑test features, listing involved files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files covering styling, hooks, components, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and themes, including extensive OKLCH color tokens and dark‑mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the app root and main TypeScript module with relative asset paths.
frontend/ops/redeploy-runbook.md: Runbook outlining prerequisites, preflight checks, and step‑by‑step instructions for a clean rebuild and redeploy.
frontend/ops/redeploy.sh: Shell script automating clean builds, dependency installs, backend binding generation, frontend build, canister deploy, and post‑deploy checks.
frontend/ops/smoke-test-checklist.md: Manual smoke‑test checklist verifying routing, asset loading, errors, and core navigation after deployment.
Template for documenting smoke‑test results with deployment info, environment details, and test status fields.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app's router, authentication checks, post-login redirect, and global providers including theme, error boundary, and toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/BonusManag: Provides a UI for admins to create and apply bonuses to users and lists existing bonus records.
frontend/src/components/admin/DepositReq: Displays pending deposit requests and allows admins to approve or reject them with optional notes.
frontend/src/components/admin/RevenuePan: Shows total platform revenue and a table of recent trading fee events.
frontend/src/components/admin/TradingSta: Aggregates trading statistics and displays recent trade activity with status and PnL info.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserDirect: Builds a directory of all users derived from trades and deposits and provides navigation to inspect individual users.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserInspec: Displays detailed user activity including trades, deposits, bonuses, fees, and P&L, using fetched data filtered by user principal.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message with an option to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthRequire: Prompts unauthenticated users to log in, handles login errors, and provides navigation back home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides login/logout functionality with error handling and Internet Identity integration.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog allowing new users to create a profile by submitting a display name, with mutation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with navigation, authentication-aware links, mobile menu, and share-link functionality.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorB: Catches application errors and displays a recovery screen with an option to reset and reload the app.
frontend/src/components/system/CenteredL: Shows a centered loading card with a spinner and optional message.
frontend/src/components/trading/Candlest: Simulates and displays live‑updating OHLC candlestick data for a currency pair, handling resizing, loading, and periodic updates.
frontend/src/components/trading/OpenTrad: Renders a table of open trades with metadata and allows closing trades via mutation.
frontend/src/components/trading/TradeHis: Displays closed trades with pricing, P&L, fees, and timestamps in a history table.
frontend/src/components/trading/TradeTic: Form for opening a new trade, letting users select pair, direction, leverage, and margin before submitting.
frontend/src/components/wallet/DepositFo: Deposit form supporting M‑Pesa and bank payments, submitting deposit requests and resetting on success.
frontend/src/components/wallet/MpesaInst: Shows dynamic M‑Pesa payment instructions for deposits or withdrawals using fetched wallet number.
frontend/src/components/wallet/RequestsH: Combines deposits, bonuses, and fees into a unified sortable history table with statuses and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/wallet/WithdrawF: Renders a withdrawal form supporting M-Pesa or bank transfer and triggers a withdraw mutation on submit.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines static app branding strings including name, tagline, and description.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBonuses.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching, applying, and managing user and system bonuses via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the caller's user profile, role, admin status, and available balance using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useFees.ts: Handles trading fee queries and submitting fees, with cache invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state and exposing login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook for fetching grouped backend data using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrading.ts: Provides hooks for opening, closing, and retrieving trades with backend integration and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallet.ts: Implements deposit, withdrawal, and deposit request management hooks with backend calls and notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom light/dark theme variables plus utility classes for gradients and text effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with authentication, role checks, and multiple admin management tabs.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the marketing landing page with login flow, feature highlights, and risk disclaimer.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Shows a 404 page with a message and navigation back to home.
frontend/src/pages/TradingPage.tsx: Provides the trading interface with balance, charts, open trades, history, and authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Renders the wallet dashboard for deposits, withdrawals, balances, and transaction history.
frontend/src/utils/authConfig.ts: Validates II provider configuration and returns user-friendly errors.
frontend/src/utils/loginRecovery.ts: Wraps login attempts with timeout handling and error normalization.
frontend/src/utils/postLoginRedirect.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears intended post-login navigation paths.
frontend/src/utils/shareableLink.ts: Builds shareable URLs using hash-based routing for canister-safe links.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, shadows, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, current issues, and deployment-related feature requirements.
